self.title: CDISC Questionnaire Bladder Control Scale Test Name Terminology

name: Bladder Control Scale Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Bladder Control Scale Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Bladder Control Scale Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you almost lost control of your bladder or had an accident?
terms.preferredTerm: BLCS - Almost Lost Control of Your Bladder

terms.definition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you altered your activities because of bladder problems?
terms.preferredTerm: BLCS - Altered Activities Because Bladder Problems

terms.definition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how much have bladder problems restricted your overall lifestyle?
terms.preferredTerm: BLCS - Bladder Problems Restrict Overall Lifestyle

terms.definition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you lost control of your bladder or had an accident?
terms.preferredTerm: BLCS - Lost Control of Your Bladder
